evidence.claim: HelloHero employs AWS services for cloud infrastructure including Lambda and S3.
The platform supports FHIR for health data interoperability.
HelloHero ensures HIPAA compliance for secure health data handling.
Integration is possible via RESTful APIs and webhooks for third-party applications.
Supports HL7 messaging standards for healthcare exchanges.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of using X12 transactions or clearinghouse services found.
